Uses of Class
nl.esciencecenter.esight.math.VecF4

  • Packages that use VecF4 
    Package Description
    nl.esciencecenter.esight.experimental
    This package is more of a storage area for currently unused classes that are highly experimental and probably buggy.
    nl.esciencecenter.esight.math
    The matrix/vector math library needed for OpenGL 3.0+ functionality.

      Constructors in nl.esciencecenter.esight.math with parameters of type VecF4 
      Constructor and Description
      Color4(VecF4 v)
      Stand-in for a vector, in which the places represent R, G, B and A values.
      MatF4(VecF4 v0, VecF4 v1, VecF4 v2, VecF4 v3)
      Creates a new matrix, using the vectors in order as filling.
      Point4(VecF4 v)
      Stand-in for a 4-place vector, where the fourth place is always 1f.
